name: json-color-token
description: A language server that enables previewing/editing hex color tokens in json documents
author: Chunan Ye

jsonColorToken.maxNumberOfColorTokens.description: Controls the maximum number of color tokens to show preview color.

jsonColorToken.colorTokenCasing.description: Whether the built-in color picker will set color code as uppercase letters or lowercase letters
enumDescriptions: Color presentation selected in the in-editor color picker will insert color code as uppercase letters (e.g. #AABBCC).
Color presentation selected in the in-editor color picker will insert color code as lowercase letters (e.g. #aabbcc).

jsonColorToken.languages.description: Languages for which to enable the extension features. Only applied when the extension starts. To enable/disable the feature on a certain type, modify the setting and restart the extension. Css and Less files will always be excluded.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
